inclusion.criterion: Be greater than or equal to18 years old and have an identifiable primary care provider.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have documented chronic HCV infection by demonstration of a positive test for hepatitis C antibody and HCV RNA of 2,000 IU/mL or greater.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: quote: The patient is diagnosed with HCV 2 years ago.

inclusion.criterion: If coinfected, have either documentation of HIV-1 infection by licensed enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (ELISA) confirmed by a Western Blot or history of HIV RNA of 1,000 copies/mL or greater.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: quote: the recent coinfection with HBV.

inclusion.criterion: If coinfected, must meet one of the following prior to enrollment:
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Have histopathologic features consistent with chronic HCV infection at the time of enrollment.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: quote: The recent biopsy was negative for hepatocellular carcinoma and was only remarkable for chronic inflammation compatible with a chronic viral hepatitis.

inclusion.criterion: Are na(SqrRoot) ve to prior IFN-based treatment for HCV.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Have CD4 cell counts greater than or equal to 100 cells/mm(3).
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Not pregnant or breastfeeding. Serum pregnancy test must be negative at screening for female participants.
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: quote: He is an alert male with no acute distress.

inclusion.criterion: Agree not to become pregnant if a female of childbearing potential while on the study and for at least 6 months after stopping RBV.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Be able and willing to either learn to safely inject medication or find another person to inject the medication for him/her.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Use of other experimental therapies (including expanded access/compassionate use of HIV antiretrovirals) within 30 days or 5 half-lives (whichever is longer), prior to enrollment.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current use of an efavirenz-based (or other NNRTI) or protease inhibitor HIV antiretroviral regimen.
exclusion.label: not_met
exclusion.evidence: quote: He is on IFN, RBV and direct antiviral drugs for the past 6 months.

exclusion.criterion: Use of any of the following medications within 6 weeks prior to enrollment.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of HCV and recent coinfection with HBV. He is on antiviral treatment for the past 6 months.
